{{title|operator-{{small|(ranges::slide_view::''sentinel'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;V&gt;
operator-( const /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;&amp; x, const /*sentinel*/&amp; y )
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;,
                                     ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;V&gt;
operator-( const /*sentinel*/&amp; y, const /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;&amp; x )
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;,
                                     ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Computes the distance between the underlying {{lt|cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator}} of {{c|x}} and the underlying {{rlp|/|sentinel}} of {{c|y}}.

Let {{lti|cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator#Data members|last_ele_}} denote the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} denote the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

@1@ Equivalent to: {{c|return x.last_ele_ - y.end_;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to: {{c|return y.end_ - x.last_ele_;}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|slide_view::''sentinel''}}|plural=yes|tmpl=no}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|an {{lt|cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator}}}}
{{par|y|a {{rlp|/|sentinel}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The distance between the iterator and the sentinel.
